title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 229: Featuring John LeClair + Noel Acciari
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by John LeClair and Noel Acciari. John joins (01:00:24) the guys in Philly to talk about his career, his time playing with Whit and his Stanley Cup win in Montreal. Acciari also joins the pod (27:35), but not before a sad prank attempt by Keith Yandle and Foley. The boys wrap up with some NHL news and a Gambling Corner (01:55:10).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
